bug.author: srochel
bug.summary: wrong reference to dev list on mxnet.io
bug.description:
Reference to dev list at <denchmark-link:http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/community/contribute.html#mxnet-dev-communications>http://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/community/contribute.html#mxnet-dev-communications</denchmark-link>
for dev list correct reference is: For Contributors to MXNet, join the DEV mailing list: MXNet Apache DEV mailing list (<denchmark-link:mailto:dev@mxnet.apache.org>dev@mxnet.apache.org</denchmark-link> ): To subscribe, send an email to <denchmark-link:mailto:dev-subscribe@mxnet.apache.org>dev-subscribe@mxnet.apache.org</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/aaronmarkham>@aaronmarkham</denchmark-link> please fix.

comments.comment: There's a fix for this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/11858>#11858</denchmark-link> but the CI is not reporting status, blocking the merge. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marcoabreu>@marcoabreu</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/eric-haibin-lin>@eric-haibin-lin</denchmark-link> The PR has been merged: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/12271>#12271</denchmark-link> we can close this off.
